name: Pesto Pasta Oolong Tea with Meatballs
description: Dive into a savory fusion of flavors with our Pesto Pasta Oolong Tea with Meatballs recipe. Perfect for those who love to enjoy high-protein, high-sodium, and high-fiber dishes without compromising on taste. This healthified recipe brings together the richness of fresh herbs, lean meat, and vibrant vegetables in a dish that's both nourishing and indulgently satisfying.

recipeInstructions.text: Dice the yellow, raw and capsicum green; slice the mushrooms, oyster, raw; and cube the eggplant, raw.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the lean beef patty with salt, ground pepper, thyme, rosemary, and marjoram. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Form small meatballs from the mixture and place them on a baking tray. Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Boil water in a pot and cook the soba (buckwheat noodles) according to package instructions, then drain.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet, sauté the diced and sliced vegetables in extra virgin olive oil over medium heat for 10 minutes until they're soft and golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: For the pesto, blend fresh basil leaves and garlic in a food processor, gradually adding olive oil until the mixture is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the cooked soba noodles with the prepared pesto in a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Add the roasted meatballs and sautéed vegetables to the bowl with the pesto noodles. Gently mix until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9

recipeInstructions.text: Serve your Pesto Pasta Oolong Tea with Meatballs hot, garnished with a sprinkle of fresh herbs or parmesan if desired. Enjoy your healthified culinary creation!
recipeInstructions.name: Step 10
